```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(distill)
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv("soccer_data.csv")

clean_data <- raw_data %>% 
  mutate(month = as.integer(str_sub(value, 7, 8))) %>%
  mutate(month = month.abb[month]) %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarise(frequency = n())
```

```{r}
clean_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(month, frequency)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_x_discrete() +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Birth Months Among EUFA Euro 2020 Players")
```
